Title: GD/RP/CS recording - GE on "You are fresh out of college applying for job "

Title: How to discuss a topic in a group
Description: Five English teachers come together to show you how to discuss a topic in a group. You'll learn how to give your opinion, interrupt, contradict, and more. We'll teach you how to use expressions like "in a nutshell", "please let me finish", and "don't get me wrong". You can use these expressions confidently in personal, social, and professional situations.

Title: 5 Tips if you don't know much about the GD Topic
Description:
The video can help you to assess your plans and enhance your presentation exponentially.
Presentation in a group discussion is based on hard work, incorporating tips and strategies to reach a common conclusion. Group discussion helps to find out whether you possess the critical qualities/skills to contribute effectively to the process even if you lack much knowledge about the topic. Such a situation in a GD tends to test your tactfulness, analytical and structuring skills. In the video, our expert faculty shares some tips and strategies to help you handle this situation in a group discussion. The video gives an insight with respect to strategies for creating a strong competitive advantage in such an event.
